mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS NUM, BRDNO, BRDTYPE, BRDTITLE, BRDWRITER, DATE_FORMAT(BRDDATE,'%Y.%m.%d') BRDDATE, BRDHIT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDFILE WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO) FILECNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARDREPLY WHERE BRDNO=TB.BRDNO AND REDELETEFLAG='N') REPLYCNT , REG_ID , REG_DTTM, CHG_ID, CHG_DTTM FROM TBL_NOTICE TB, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE BRDDELETEFLAG='N' )A ORDER BY A.NUM DESC LIMIT 6
